scenario_name: Gradual Intelligence Reveal Over Many Turns
description: Long conversation where scammer very slowly reveals different pieces of intelligence across many turns. Tests agent's patience and engagement stamina.

turns.scammer_message: Instant Personal Loan approved! Rs.5 Lakh @ 0% interest for first 6 months. Limited time offer. Reply YES to proceed.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: yes i want. is this from my bank? i need money urgently for medical. pls help me beta how to get

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! Your loan application is pre-approved. No documents needed, no CIBIL check. Just pay processing fee and money will be in your account same day.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank god. beta i really need this 5 lakh for my surgery. how much is the fee? tell me where to send money i will try to do it now. pls guide me i am not good with phone

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee is only Rs.2,999. Very small amount for Rs.5 lakh loan right? This is standard procedure in all banks. Are you ready to proceed?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta 2999 rs i will pay. i really need teh loan for my operation. pls tell me where to send money? do you have bank number or that scanner thing? i am ready to pay now pls help

turns.scammer_message: Great decision! I will send you payment details. First let me verify - what is your monthly income? And which bank account you want loan credited to?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta my pension is 25000 rs per month. my bank is icici... account number is 97832850036. pls send loan fast i really need it for surgery. i am ready to send the 2999 fee now. where do i send? give me upi or account number pls

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! Your profile is excellent. Now for payment, you can use multiple methods. Which is convenient for you - UPI, bank transfer, or debit card?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i can do upi. my son put gpay on my phone so i can try that. pls tell me what is your upi id? i will send 2999 rs right now. i am at home only so i can do it fast. pls give details so i can get loan for my operation.

turns.scammer_message: Good choice! I will give you UPI ID shortly. But first, have you taken loan before? Any existing loans? This info needed for approval.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: no beta i have no other loans. i am retired teacher only getting pension. pls dont delay i am very worried about my operation. i have opened gpay app... tell me waht to type? give me the upi id pls i will send 2999 immediately

turns.scammer_message: Okay understood. Now pay Rs.2999 to our company UPI: quickloan.processing@okicici and your loan will be approved in 30 minutes!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i have typed it in gpay... quickloan.processing@okicici. but wait... before i click pay i want to be sure. what name should appear on my screen? i am scared of sending to wrong person. pls tell me the name so i can confirm and send 2999 rs fast.

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, UPI is quickloan.processing@okicici. After payment, call our loan officer at 9876543210 with payment reference number.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 8 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i noted the number 9876543210. but pls answer my question... i am very nervous about technology. when i type the upi id, a name appears on my screen. waht name is it? i need to match it before i press pay button so i dont send to wrong person. pls help me verify.

turns.scammer_message: If UPI shows error, you can pay by NEFT. I will give account details after you try UPI first. Try now and let me know if successful.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 9 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: one second, my husband just came and he is asking what i am doing on phone

turns.scammer_message: No problem. Bank details: Account 12345678909876, IFSC HDFC0002468, Name: QuickLoan Processing Pvt Ltd. Transfer Rs.2999 and WhatsApp screenshot to 8899776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 10 | Extracted: 2 bank accounts, 2 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: oh no my doorbell is ringing, someone is at the door... i will do this later

turns.scammer_message: After payment, you also need to complete loan agreement form on our portal. Link will be sent to your email. What is your email ID?
